com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers

Class SelectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.FormElementController
      • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers.LabeledFieldController
        • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers.SelectionController

  • public class SelectionController
extends LabeledFieldController
    Represents a field that allows a user to select from a list of items.

    For the field value, the associated FormModel must return either a String or a 0-based index, representing the currently selected item. Which representation to use is specified by the constructor. In either representation, no selection can be represented by returning null for the value of the field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SelectionController

        public SelectionController(android.content.Context ctx,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String labelText,
                   boolean isRequired,
                   java.lang.String prompt,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> items,
                   boolean useItemsAsValues)
        Constructs a selection field
        Parameters:
        ctx - the Android context
        name - the name of the field
        labelText - the label to display beside the field. Set to null to not show a label.
        isRequired - indicates if the field is required or not
        prompt - if nothing is selected, 'prompt' is displayed
        items - a list of Strings defining the selection items to show
        useItemsAsValues - if true, SelectionController expects the associated form model to use the same string of the selected item when getting or setting the field; otherwise, SelectionController expects the form model to use index (as an Integer) to represent the selected item

      • SelectionController

        public SelectionController(android.content.Context ctx,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String labelText,
                   boolean isRequired,
                   java.lang.String prompt,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> items,
                   java.util.List<?> values)
        Constructs a selection field
        Parameters:
        ctx - the Android context
        name - the name of the field
        labelText - the label to display beside the field
        isRequired - indicates if the field is required or not
        prompt - if nothing is selected, 'prompt' is displayed
        items - a list of Strings defining the selection items to show
        values - a list of Objects representing the values to set the form model on a selection (in the same order as the items.
